description: This notification signifies that status of the Resource Manager
service changed.
This specifies the status of the Resource Manager server.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-RMPS-MIB::jnxMbgRMPSServiceStatus

description: This notification signifies that status of a Resource Manager
client changed.
This identifies the Resource Manager client, in the form
ms-a/b/c or pfe-a/b/c, where <a> is the fpc slot, <b> is pic slot
and <c> is the port.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-RMPS-MIB::jnxMbgRMPSClientIdentifier

description: This specifies the status of a client registered with the Resource
Manager server.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-RMPS-MIB::jnxMbgRMPSClientStatus

description: This notification signifies a change in status or redundancy role
of the specified Resource Manager client.

event.Summary: Resource manager client $v1 is $v2; Redundancy role: $v3

description: This identifies the Resource Manager client, in the form
ms-a/b/c or pfe-a/b/c, where <a> is the fpc slot, <b> is pic slot
and <c> is the port.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-RMPS-MIB::jnxMbgRMPSClientIdentifier

description: This specifies the status of a client registered with the Resource
Manager server.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-RMPS-MIB::jnxMbgRMPSClientStatus

description: This specifies the redundancy role of the Resource Manager client
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-RMPS-MIB::jnxMbgRMPSClientRedundancyRole

description: This notification signifies a change in status or redundancy role
of the specified Resource Manager client.

event.Summary: Resource manager client $v2 is $v4; Redundancy role: $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-RMPS-MIB::jnxMbgRMPSClientStateChange JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAYS::jnxMbgGwName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-RMPS-MIB::jnxMbgRMPSClientIdentifier s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-RMPS-MIB::jnxMbgRMPSClientRedundancyRole i 0 JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-RMPS-MIB::jnxMbgRMPSClientStatus i 0

description: Gateway Name.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAYS::jnxMbgGwName

description: This identifies the Resource Manager client, in the form
ms-a/b/c or pfe-a/b/c, where <a> is the fpc slot, <b> is pic slot
and <c> is the port.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-RMPS-MIB::jnxMbgRMPSClientIdentifier

description: This specifies the redundancy role of the Resource Manager client
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-RMPS-MIB::jnxMbgRMPSClientRedundancyRole

description: This specifies the status of a client registered with the Resource
Manager server.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-RMPS-MIB::jnxMbgRMPSClientStatus
